questions.question: Explore differences in mean math scores for different genders across different races

answer.value: There exists a covincing advantage for male group in mean math score.

key_insights: There is a clear upward trend in math scores across the groups. Group E has the highest total mean score, followed by Group D, Group C, Group B, and Group A
There is a consistent trend where male students have a higher mean math score than female students across all racial/ethnic categories represented in this dataset except group B
The blue bars (females) show less variation

reasoning.reasoning: We want to research on the difference for different genders
We want to directly show the gap between male and female.
